amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2018, LB377, § 87. Operative date January 1, 2019. Class VI school district; board of education; members; election.
amendatorysection.para: The governing body of each Class VI school district shall be a board consisting of a president, a vice president, a secretary, a treasurer, and two other voting members, to be elected as provided in section 32-546, and also may include one or more nonvoting student members selected pursuant to section 79-559.

crossreference.para: For qualifications of members of board of education, see section 79-543.
